00031 #define BEGINNING_OF_WORD 0x01
00032 #define BEGINNING_OF_STR  0x02
00033 #define ANYWHERE_IN_STR   0x04
00034

00158 #include "SearchNotice.h"
00159 
00160 inline uint32
00161 MultiStringSearch::getIndex(const MultiSearchNotice* notice) const
00162 {
00163    // Pointer arithmetics.
00164    return notice-m_stringIdx;
00165 }
00166 
00167 inline uint32
00168 MultiStringSearch::getStartOffset(const MultiSearchNotice* notice) const
00169 {
00170    if ( getIndex(notice) == 0 ) {
00171       return 0;
00172    } else {
00173       // Take the previous notice
00174       --notice;
00175       return notice->m_endOfItems;
00176    }
00177 }
00178 
00179 inline uint32
00180 MultiStringSearch::getEndOffset(const MultiSearchNotice* notice) const
00181 {
00182    return notice->m_endOfItems;
00183 }
00184 
00185 inline const SearchMapItem*
00186 MultiStringSearch::getSearchMapItem(uint32 idx) const
00187 {
00188    return m_map->getItemByIndex(m_infoVectorIdx[idx]);
00189 }
00190 
00191 inline uint8
00192 MultiStringSearch::getNameNbr(uint32 idx) const
00193 {
00194    return m_infoVectorNameNbr[idx];
00195 }
00196 
00197 inline uint8
00198 MultiStringSearch::getWordNbr(const MultiSearchNotice* notice,
00199                               int offset) const
00200 {
00201    const int index = getStartOffset(notice)+offset;
00202    return (m_infoVectorStringPartMasks[index] >> 3 ) & 0x07;
00203 }
00204 
00205 inline uint8
00206 MultiStringSearch::getStringPartMask(const MultiSearchNotice* notice,
00207                                      int offset) const
00208 {
00209    const int index = getStartOffset(notice)+offset;
00210    return m_infoVectorStringPartMasks[index] & 0x07;
00211 }
